pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Prime Minister Shinzo Abe of Japan | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
The Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, spoke with the Prime Minister of Japan Shinzo Abe.

The leaders discussed shared concerns following the North Korean nuclear test. Prime Minister Trudeau highlighted Canada’s unwavering support for Japan and shared Canada’s commitment to cooperate on multilateral solutions to enhance security in the region and to respond to the North Korean nuclear test.
